name: BlockBuilder [alpha]
description:
here you can build 2d stuff like pixel art or other kinds with the 8 available blocks

CONTROLS:

  • arrow keys: Move camera.
  • S: Save level.
  • L: load level.
  • Left Click: Destroy Block.
  • Right Click: Place Block.
  • number keys: Select Block.

i just wanted to come back to the minecraft in 2d idea for as a side project. Have Fun!
